## 📊 Salary Forecasting Using Python & Power BI

**Goal:** Predict salaries based on job title, education level, and location.  
**Stack:** Python (Pandas, Sklearn), SQL, Power BI  
**What I Did:**  
- Cleaned & engineered variables from raw survey data  
- Built regression model with 85% R² accuracy  
- Visualized role-based salary distribution and geographic variance  
**Impact:** Enabled compensation benchmarking for HR use cases  
🎯 *Turned raw CSV into insight-packed dashboards + ML predictions*

## 🏠 New York Real Estate – Predictive, Prescriptive & Descriptive Analysis

**Goal:** Analyze and forecast real estate trends across boroughs in NYC  
**Approach:** Combined exploratory data analysis (descriptive), regression modeling (predictive), and price-based optimization (prescriptive)  
**Stack:** Python, Pandas, Matplotlib, Scikit-learn, Solver

**What I Did:**  
- Conducted trend analysis on historical housing prices  
- Built a linear regression model to forecast property values by zip code  
- Used Solver in Excel to prescribe optimal pricing zones for buyers and investors  
- Visualized borough-wise differences using interactive plots and dashboards  

**Impact:** Helped simulate pricing behavior under different policy or economic assumptions, valuable for urban planners and investors

📈 *Blended the full power of analytics: past, present, and future.*
